div.head: Memorandum From William Slany (Director of the Historian’s Office) to Henry Bardach (Director of Systematic Review)
div.p: Subject: Declassification of FRUS, 1952-1954, Volume X, Iran (1951-1954)

This Office has carefully considered the contents of your referenced memo and is prepared to agree with the results of the CDC review with the exception of the following two documents listed for denial of declassification on p. 2 of your memo.

list.item: 411-412 TAU. Memo of Telcon between JFDulles and Allen Dulles, July 24, 1953.
413 TAU. Memo of Telcon between JFDulles and Wisner (CIA), July 25, 1953.

div.p: As the attached copies indicate, these two documents were declassified some time ago and were published in 1980 on microfilm by University Publications of America. They have also been available to the general public for research at the Eisenhower Library for a like period of time. In view of this, I ask for restoration of the full text of both documents to the volume.
I understand that your response will constitute agreement between our two offices on Department of State clearance and that we await other agency clearances including NSC.
